roleset.name: puke, throw up, (involuntarily) purge, vomit, purge
roleset.note: REGURGITATE-V NOTES: Frame created by Arrick (from regurgitate.01-v)

example.name: always better the second time around
example.text: Either she either passed out regurgitated.

example.name: metaphorical
example.text: Boehner was very partisan in his regurgitation of the right wing talking points.
example.arg: of the right wing talking points
